TestDescription.name: ASP.NET MVC version disclosure
TestDescription.Description: The HTTP responses returned by this web application include a header named [bold]X-AspNetMvc-Version[/bold]. The value of this header disclose the version of ASP.NET MVC in use. It is not necessary for production sites and should be disabled.
TestDescription.Impact: The HTTP header may disclose sensitive information. This information can be used to launch further attacks.
TestDescription.Recommendation: To remove the X-AspNetMvc-Version header add the following code in Global.asax, in the Application Start event: [pre] MvcHandler.DisableMvcResponseHeader = true; [/pre]
